title: The most important IT hire for CIOs in 2026 may not be human

title: India can be global AI use case capital: MeitY Secretary
description: India should aim to become the global use case capital for artificial intelligence (AI) if the adoption of the technology is to be spread widely, electronics and information technology secretary S Krishnan said on Monday.
